descriptionHtml:
thanks  Boris the great ENBSeries!

=====================================

My English is not good, please read the following steps of patience?Please understand?

====================================================================================


INSTALLATION: 
1. Download ENBSeries (0.217)  Archive from.

2. Unpack the Archive, find the d3d9.dll (wrapperversion) and copy into your 

Skyrim Main Folder.

3. Unpack my Archive and copy all in your skyrim Main Folder.

4.Extraction of the main document Climates Of Tamriel in your data files.
Climates Of Tamriel 3.1 ?http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802

5.install Enhanced Lights and FX ? http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043


===============================================================================

Know:

1. Make sure your game version 1.8.151.0 or more, that the 11 Version patch.
 
2.Game 10 brightness
 
3.Before you start the Game: bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 must be set in SkyrimPrefs.ini File to activate this .

============================================================================================

manually :

following lines in File SkyrimPrefs.ini:
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

Close the anti aliasing game, should be used in the SMAA.

==================================================================

CREDITS:
Boris Vorontsov (ENB Developer)

Author K ENB?Using his depth of field effect?

=====================================================
